attributes.action: To increase the funding given to CAMHS in order to help young minds.
attributes.additional_details: We want to ensure teens have the chance to have an easy going journey into the future of adulthood. The ability to provide more support for children will help children to feel safer and happier and minimising the effects their mental health has later in their life.
attributes.background: We would like for the Government/Parliament to raise the findings given to CAMHS due to rising mental health concerns in young people.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620846
